24h 24 hour format: 15
am/pm am or pm
d Day of month in single digit: 6
dd Day of month in double digit: 06
dw Day of week number: 4
dW Day of week text abbreviated: Thur
DW Day of week in full: Thursday
dy Day of year: 361
Era A.D.
m Month in single digit: 8
M Month text abbreviated: Aug
min Minutes: 32
mm Month in double digits: 08
MM Month in full: August
sp Splitseconds: 999
ss Seconds: 59
w Week of year single digit: 9
ww Week of year double digit: 52
yy Year in 2 digits: 78
yyyy Year in 4 digits: 2013
Z Time zone in short format: GMT (if available)
ZZ Time zone: Grenwich mean time
ZZZ Time zone offset: GMT +2:00"><sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"><x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean></scg:Dictionary></sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState></uaba:DsfCommentActivity></FlowStep></Flowchart></Activity>
